title: Views of Las Vegas, On-Site Dry Cleaning Services, Double Sinks
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 74', 'OR Text', '74', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath, approximately 1103 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Live in style at EVO Apartments.', 'Only minutes from Downtown Summerlin, NV, our spacious one, two and three bedroom apartments and lofts have been thoughtfully crafted to provide you the desert oasis you deserve.', 'We offer our residents an impressive selection of amenities and facilities.', 'Relax around our resort-inspired rooftop pool or soak in the infinity edge Jacuzzi overlooking the Las Vegas Strip and mountains.', 'Enjoy spin classes, yoga, Pilates or work on your three point shot in our indoor basketball court.', 'Head up to the second floor spa and fitness center for a cardio workout followed by some time in our sauna and steam rooms.', 'Features:', 'Quartz Countertops, Modern Aesthetic, Glass Frameless Shower Doors*, Oversized Master Suites featuring Walk-in Closets, Energy-Efficient Stainless-Steel Kitchen Appliances, Blackout Solar Roller Shades, Double Sinks, Ceiling Fan in Bedrooms, Quiet Apartments, Convenient Location, Expansive 9\' Ceilings, Private Garages Available*, Private Balcony or Patio*, Pendant Lighting, Oversized 42" Tubs*, Distinctive Hardwood-Style Floors, 1 Gigabit Per Second Fiber-Optic High Speed Internet Available', '* Only available in select apartments', 'Community Amenities:', 'Package Lockers, Views of Las Vegas, 4 Pools Throughout the Property (2 are heated year-round, 1 is an Olympic lap pool), Complimentary WiFi in Clubhouse, BBQ Grills, Gated Electronic Entrance, Open Air Rooftop Lounge, Poolside Cabanas, Dog Park, Spin Classes, Yoga, Pilates, Wet Bar, Business Center, Multi-Use Indoor Basketball Court, On-Site Dry Cleaning Services, Sauna and Steam Rooms, 24 Hour Spa & Fitness Center, Infinity Edge Jacuzzi, Massage Rooms, Game Room, Volleyball Court, Coffee Bar, Fire Pits, Hammock Lounge Area, Library', 'Pet Policy', 'EVO offers a choice of pet-friendly or pet-free apartments for rent in southwest Las Vegas.', 'We have options for all of your needs.', 'If you do have a pet, we invite you to bring your furry friend to the community dog park after stopping by your EVO leasing office for their treat!', 'Income Requirements:', '3x', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>',
